user_profile.cover_letter_template: I am excited to apply for the {position} role at {company}. As a Senior Data Engineer with 6+ years of experience in designing cloud-native, large-scale data platforms and real-time analytics pipelines, I am confident I can contribute significantly to your team. My expertise includes building event-driven architectures using Kafka, Pub/Sub, and Spark, orchestrating complex workflows with Airflow and Matillion, and implementing ETL framework design and CDC-based data modeling using Snowpipe, Streams, and Tasks. I have proven experience partnering with cross-functional product, ML, and analytics teams to deliver high-quality, globally scalable data solutions across GCP, AWS, and Snowflake.
